Package Distributed.ServerRMI

Class RMIPlayer

java.lang.Object
Distributed.RemotePlayer
Distributed.ServerRMI.RMIPlayer
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class RMIPlayer extends RemotePlayer
RMIPlayer is a class which extends RemotePlayer. It represents the RMI remote player.

    • endMatch

      public void endMatch()
      This method sets the client state to END when the match is finished.
      Overrides:
      endMatch in class RemotePlayer

    • update

      public void update(BoardView boardView) throws IOException, InterruptedException
      This method invokes the Client update() method which invokes the View update. It is used to update the Board through the serializable BoardView.
      Overrides:
      update in class RemotePlayer
      Parameters:
      boardView - the serializable BoardView
      Throws:
      IOException
      InterruptedException

    • reconnect

      public void reconnect(Client client, int id)
      This method reconnects a Client to the game it was playing. It creates a link between the "new" Client and the old one through their common RMIPlayer: the new client is set as a parameter of the RMIPlayer and the state and the lobby id of the new client are setted taking the values from the RMIPlayer.
      Specified by:
      reconnect in class RemotePlayer
      Parameters:
      client - the "new" Client
      id - the Lobby ID
